scene_description_enriched: Within a circular frame decorated with blue and gold, two figures are depicted. On the left, a youthful figure with brown hair, wearing a red garment over a grey tunic, extends their left hand towards the other figure. On the right, an older figure with a beard and brown hair, dressed in a green tunic and a pink robe, sits with their hands clasped. The background is a shimmering gold, suggesting a divine or ethereal setting. The scene is framed by a blue band with gold diamond-shaped motifs.
